prompt: {"storyDescription":"A young girl finds a lost puppy in the park and tries to find its owner.","sceneDescriptions":["A young girl is playing in the park, surrounded by trees and a playground. The girl looks around, wondering who the puppy belongs to.","The girl holds the puppy and walks around the park, asking other park visitors if they recognize the puppy. People shake their heads and smile.","Finally, the girl sees a worried-looking woman holding a leash and calling out.
